opinion.attorneys:
Dennis J. Roberts II, Atty. Gen., Michael J. McEntee, Sp. Asst. Atty. Gen., for plaintiff.
Griffin Higgins, Kirk Y. Griffin, Boston, Mass., for defendant.
opinion.opinion_text: [1] ORDER [2] Treating the defendant's motion for bail as a petition for writ of habeas corpus, the petition is hereby granted. This matter is remanded to the Superior Court with directions that said court conduct a bail hearing forthwith as is required by Super.R. Crim.P. 5.
